tuv.seg: Comptroller and Auditor General
An tArd-Reachtaire Ciste agus Cuntas
The Irish Constitution states that a Comptroller and Auditor General must be appointed
Sonraíonn Bunreacht na hÉireann go gcaithfear Ard-Reachtaire Cuntas agus Ciste a cheapadh
The main function of the Comptroller and Auditor General is to carry out an audit every year of the State's accounts
Is é príomhdhualgas an Ard-Reachtaire Cuntas agus Ciste ná iniúchadh a dhéanamh go bliantúil ar chuntais stáit na hÉireann
He or she then submits an annual report of the audit to Dáil Eireann
Ina dhiaidh sin, seolann sé nó sí tuarascáil bhliantúil ar an iniúchadh chuig Dáil Éireann
The Comptroller and Auditor General is nominated by Dáil Eireann and appointed by the Irish President
Ainmníonn Dáil Éireann an tArd-Reachtaire Cuntas agus Ciste agus ceapann Uachtarán na hÉireann é/í
You can read further information on the current Comptroller and Auditor General on audgen.gov.ie
Tá eolas ar an tArd-Reachtaire Cuntas agus Ciste laithreach ar audgen.gov.ie
The Comptroller and Auditor General is also the Supreme Audit Institution (SAI) for Ireland
Is é Ard-Reachtaire Cuntas agus Ciste na hÉireann Uasfhoras Iniúchóireachta (SAI) na hÉireann freisin
Supreme Audit Institutions in Ireland and abroad are linked through a number of regional and international bodies:
Bíonn Uasfhorais Iniúchóireachta in Éirinn agus thar lear ceangailte trí roinnt forais réigiúnacha agus idirnáisiúnta:
• The European Organisation of Supreme Audit Institutions (EUROSAI)
• Eagraíochtaí Eorpacha na nArdfhoras Iniúchóireachta (European Organisation of Supreme Audit Institutions) (EUROSAI)
• The International Organisation of Supreme Audit Institutions (INTOSAI) The Comptroller and Auditor General cannot be a member of the Oireachtas (the Irish Houses of Parliament)
• Eagraíochtaí Idirnáisiúnta na nArdfhoras Iniúchóireachta (International Organisation of Supreme Audit Institutions) (INTOSAI)
You can see an overview of government expenditure on whereyourmoneygoes.gov.ie, a website of the Office of the Government Chief Information Officer
Níl cead ag an Ard-Reachtaire Ciste agus Cuntas a bheith ina bhall den Oireachtas
